content: the double crossed hat features crossed double_crochet stitches worked in rounds in worsted weight yarn the pattern includes 11 sizes skill level easy crochet pattern sizes preemie newborn 0-3 months 3-6 months 6-12 months 12-24 months 3-6 years 7-10 years teen adult medium and adult large languages available english **materials** required yarn red heart super saver stripes category #4 aran yardage 170 yards hooks us 9 0 - 5 5 mm gauges 1 6 stitches x 1 75 row = 1 inches in xdc two hat lengths have also been included - the hat has been designed to reach the base of the earlobe and additional instructions are provided to make this hat reach mid-ear length instead **this pattern is available for free on my website which is monetized by ads if you prefer an ad-free version of the pattern it is available to purchase from my pattern shop ** ♥ rhondda instagram https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ instagram reels https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/reels/ https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/reels/ tiktok https //www tiktok com/@oombawkadesigncrochet https //www tiktok com/@oombawkadesigncrochet pinterest https //www pinterest com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ https //www pinterest com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ youtube https //www youtube com/oombawkadesigncrochet https //www youtube com/oombawkadesigncrochet facebook https //www facebook com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ https //www facebook com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ newsletter https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/crochet-newsletter https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/crochet-newsletter © 2012-2024 designed by rhondda mol oombawka design crochet all rights reserved you may sell finished items you crochet from this pattern no part of this publication may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from rhondda mol
